actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for financial assistance to improve the capabilities of units of local government to deal with career criminals, to establish the Office of Repeat Offenders Prosecution Projects within Law Enforcement Assistance Administration, and for other purposes.
subjects: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

summary.text: Repeat Offenders Prosecution Act - Authorizes the Administrator of the Law Enforcement Assistance Administration (LEAA) to provide financial and technical assistance to eligible units of general local government for establishing and operating programs to identify and expedite the prosecution and conviction of career criminal offenders. Establishes the Office of Repeat Offenders Prosecution Projects within LEAA to administer such programs.

titles.title: A bill to provide for financial assistance to improve the capabilities of units of local government to deal with career criminals, to establish the Office of Repeat Offenders Prosecution Projects within Law Enforcement Assistance Administration, and for other purposes.
